column4: anyone could help me with wireless Atheros card AR5007EG? kismet doesn't see any network. the capture source is madwifi_g,wifi0,madwifi. googled a lot about it, nothing as far.
as far as i tried form terminal, no
can you confirm that the card is seen by linux, and that there is a wifi network to see?
i see only wifi0 as a w/l interface, there is also ath0, but not shown on ifconfig
i see only wifi0 as a w/l interface, there is also ath0, but not shown on ifconfig
it was there before but disappeared
btw, i'm using bt4 beta based on ubuntu
when was ath0 there but not now? previous bt version?
you didnt' answer my last question
it disappeared when i did airmon-ng stop
